TopicTitle: TIGER 1 - WW2 Tank Replica (Ausf. E Re-Release)

Articles.Content:
![c3ZAyz1.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/c3ZAyz1.jpg)

**Pz.KPfw. VI Ausf. E - Tiger I (Early Production)**

**Designer: Zekes**

**Status:****COMPLETED**

**Cost: $297,042.00**

**The Tiger was one of the best known tanks of all time. It was a German Heavy Tank of World War II. 1300 were built, and amassed a staggering 10:1 kill ratio in combat.**

**Comes with rotating turret, simply stage. Body requires a "control from here" from the docking port MG in order to operate normally. Camouflage not included.**

***Download:*** [https://www./?9fnhx6wjn8txywa](https://www./?9fnhx6wjn8txywa)

Nice work as usual, Zekes! You never fail to impress with such amount of detail ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Repped!

- - - Updated - - -

Just another quick question -- How did you attach the decals on the tank?

Another great replica tank. Can we see it as it is though?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-20T17:41:22Z" title="07/20/2015 05:41  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 20, 2015</time> by Majorjim**
  
Seemed mean

Nice work . I test it Now .

You also make a nice work on the snapshoot . ( Like the "old picture" FX )

I look at my bag if i got some rep inside ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

EDIT : ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Diesel Powered ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-20T17:43:55Z" title="07/20/2015 05:43  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 20, 2015</time> by ZLM-Master**

It's a really early version, in fact I just got it running when I did this picture and made the file, I know the turret seems a little small, will probably scale up a bit and try to rework gun barrel. And yes, it is powered by real fuel ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Here's the un-edited photo:

![SCNvmRX.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/SCNvmRX.jpg)

You can hide those strut ends on the turret man. If you start the strut on the turret part you can then just offset the end part into the tank. It attaches just the same. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I thought that was related to whinie the poo. Instead I got a tank, I like the tank though.

II have updated the download for the new reworked version, take a look at it 

EDIT: 

![3mHglPp.jpg?1](http://i.imgur.com/3mHglPp.jpg?1)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-20T22:29:26Z" title="07/20/2015 10:29  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 20, 2015</time> by zekes**
What is the current part count on that?
After a lot of work, I re-released the Tiger 1 as the Ausf. E - it's 613 parts, 39.6 tons. Drives like a dream. Enjoy, I put about 14 hours of work into this.

> 
> After a lot of work, I re-released the Tiger 1 as the Ausf. E - it's 613 parts, 39.6 tons. Drives like a dream. Enjoy, I put about 14 hours of work into this.

That's a lot! Looks even better ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Sorry for pestering, but I'm curious about how you added the logos on the tank - Was it in a KSP mod, or edited into the picture?

Thanks!

> 
> That's a lot! Looks even better ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
> Sorry for pestering, but I'm curious about how you added the logos on the tank - Was it in a KSP mod, or edited into the picture?
> 
> Thanks!

It's fine, I love it when people are interested in how I do it :3

I use GIMP - It's a free image editing program - to add the details. here's the unedited screenshot of the title photo:

![PA1LV6f.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/PA1LV6f.jpg)
Oh, thanks! Wow, looks jaw-dropping even without editing! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Yep , it look a bit cleaner righ now ! I'm still love your replica there so nice !
